testcase.classname: This feature is to validate the purchase from demoblaze website
testcase.name: User adds two products, deletes one from cart and completes the purchase
testcase.system-out: Given User is in demoblaze homepage.........................................passed When User navigates through the category "Phones"...........................passed And User navigates through the category "Monitors"..........................passed And User navigates through the category "Laptops"...........................passed And User adds the product "Sony vaio i5" to cart............................passed And User accepts the confirmation popup.....................................passed And User navigates through the category "Laptops"...........................passed And User adds the product "Dell i7 8gb" to cart.............................passed And User accepts the confirmation popup.....................................passed And User navigates to cart..................................................passed And User deletes "Dell i7 8gb" from cart....................................passed And User clicks on Place order..............................................passed And User fills in the form with following details...........................passed And User Clicks on purchase.................................................passed Then Purchase confirmation popup is displayed with purchaseid and amount....passed And User Clicks on ok.......................................................passed
